thread.title: Ubeatable Location & Style in Paris -
thread.title_full: Ubeatable Location & Style in Paris - Review of Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sebastiendc25
title: Ubeatable Location & Style in Paris -
text:
Paris has so many hotels and when it comes to find the right compromise between location, style and value for money, the Sofitel Le Faubourg is the best.
I lived in Paris 10 years and went there many times for business but always struggled to find a stylish hotel, with rooms big enough and modern services. I went to Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg for leisure with my kids and the hotel was ideally located to visit the city, very professional and friendly staff as well as very comfortable and stylish rooms. Will definitely go back next time.
